dc:title:
House of Hospitality,
Chapter One
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Engaging vignettes about the daily work of the early depression era movement: helping the evicted, street corner speaking, the impersonal shelters run by the city, and the delightful conversation of children around the office.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 436 1939-02-02 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
